unnormalised: Boro, mhaka Flipkart-antlean ghelea satolleak ekdam bareak phone cover order kel'lem, barabor asa? Delivery-chi andazh kel'li tarik 20/10/2024 asli, punn mhaka khobor asa mhaji kismat kashi asa mhonn, mhaka itlo visvas naslo. Thonddich sangtam, online shopping-ache mhaje delivery records Indie FIFA World Cup jinkhta title bore asat (kai vaitt dista mhonn dhonvar naka!). Kitem tori asat, website-an sanglam asli kimmat Rs. 999 asli, punn mhaka Rs. 499 "special Dussehra sale"-ant mell'li. Mhakak dislem, "Wah! Kya deal hai!"
normalised: Boro, mhaka Flipkart-antlean ekdom mast phone cover last week order kellem, bara? Delivery kiteak tor, twenty october two thousand and twenty four ashi dakhoitali, punn mhojem naseeb polleun maka itlo bharoso naslo. Seriously, online shopping-antli mhoji delivery track record India-chi F-I-F-A World Cup jinkpachi possibility kitlei asli tevdich asa (no offense, bhau!). Anyway, website-acher original price rupee nine hundred and ninety nine asli, punn mhaka rupee four hundred and ninety nine-ak "special Dussehra sale"-ant mell'li. Mhaka dislem, "Wah! Kya deal hai!"

unnormalised: Bhavarth tumkam sangtam, deal... boro, atam mhaje kodden ekdam bhov vibrant turquoise phone cover asa classy matte black-achem je mhaka order kel'lem tache bodlak. Listing ID FLCK24867392 kitem tori aslem, punn mhaka mell'lem title FLCK-up aslem! Utrancho khel ekdum dur, payment UPI-antlean ekdum bori zali - transaction ID UPI241015937462 - punn thode tori tannim tem borem kelem. Mhaka dista thodi jikhai astana title ek jikhai astach, barabor asa?
normalised: Punn, deal asli... sodd mhunon di, atam mhojer ekdom vibrant shade-achem turquoise phone cover asa matte black phone cover ji mhaka zai asli tichi zagoir. Listing I-D kitem tori F-L-C-K two four eight six seven three nine two ashem asli, punn mhaka kitem mellem te F-L-C-K-up! Jokes ekuch kodden diun, payment U-P-I-antlean smooth-an zali - transaction I-D U-P-I two four one zero one five nine three seven four six two - kiteak tori tanim tem bari kelem. Mhaka dista thodi-si jikh mhunnllear jikhich, bara?

unnormalised: Return-achi prakriya ekdum sopi dista, website-achea pormannem. Thode button click korunk poddtat ani "reverse pickup" chờvunk poddta. Adhi adhi mhakak dista rickshaw wala aik delivery munisache bodlak yetlo, punn kai punn Indie sambhav asa. Refund amount mhonnge 7-10 business diwasant credit zanvchi asa. Mhaka visvas zanvcho mhaka to distana, thonddich sangtam. Ajjun ek refund chờvtam "imported" charger-antlean je mhaka Amazon-antlean ghelem poile mhoineak, order ID AMZN789546123. Hanv dekhthaim konn mhajea ghara poilem pauta!
normalised: Website-achea pormonnem return process ekdom sope asa. Thodim buttons click korunk zai ani "reverse pickup"-ak wait korunk zai. Mhaka adhi dista delivery guy-chea zagoir rickshaw wala yetlo, punn India-ant kitem-i possible asa. Refund amount sat te dha business days-chea bhitor credit zatli mhunnllear, mhaka zanchear bharoso nam. Hanoon-ui 'imported' charger mhaka last month Amazon-antlean ghetla tache refund-ak wait korta, order I-D A-M-Z-N seven eight nine five four six one two three. Polleunko kon mhajea ghora adhi pavta!

unnormalised: Sachin sangta mhaka, mhakan thonddich lokalen bazarantlean vastu ghevcheo poddtat. Atam hanv dekhta kai mhaka melta mhonn mhaje kashta ghoddenkhele Rs. 500 dita poile. Punn punn, vaatt ghetanchea gunnanchi zaroorat next level-ak asth. Tem ekdum chotem UPSC exam asta ek bori kimmat mellounk kilo bhindicho!
normalised: Honestly, mhaka local market-antlean vostu gheunko favo. Thoinch tor mhaka dista mhaka kitem melta rupee five hundred diuchea adim. Punn punno bargaining skills ekdom next level-ache asta. Bhindi ek kilo-ak decent price-ak ghevpak to U-P-S-C exam dili tevdi hota!

unnormalised: Te, moral of the story? Online shopping Indie: ek bhirantichi rollercoaster umed, nirasa, ani ek achanak turquoise phone cover. Ani, product reviews-ank dekha "Buy Now" button click kelea poile. Shikhon ghelem (umedi asunk!).
normalised: So, story-chi moral kitem? India-ant online shopping: hope, disappointment ani occasional unexpected turquoise phone cover-achi ek thrilling rollercoaster. Ani punno, product reviews B-E-F-O-R-E tum "Buy Now" button-ak click kortat te polleunko. Lesson shinklem (hopefuly)!
